"I'm so glad you took that risk and pursued your dream! You ended up doing exactly what you wanted to do and it paid off in so many ways."
"You know what? It's okay if you don't know what you want to do yet. Take some time to explore different options and figure out what really makes you happy."
"Remember that failure is not the end of the world. Learn from your mistakes and use them as opportunities to grow and improve."
"You're stronger than you think. Keep pushing yourself outside of your comfort zone and try new things. You'll surprise yourself with what you're capable of."

"Don't compare yourself to others. Everyone has their own unique journey, and what works for one person may not work for another. Focus on your own progress and celebrate your successes, no matter how small they may seem."
